languages.text: "Ваша Светлость... Член моего семейства оказался замешан в чем-то темном и поплатился за это, но среди знати рода Гапрак он был одинок. Мы служим Омниссии и вам". {n}Ториана покорно опускает голову перед вами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ваша Светлость... Член моего семейства оказался замешан в чем-то темном и поплатился за это, но среди знати рода Гапрак он был одинок. Мы служим Омнисии и вам". {n}Ториана покорно опускает голову перед вами.{/n}
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... A member of my family appears to have been involved in something sinister and paid the price for it, but he was an oddity among the nobles of House Gaprak. We serve the Omnissiah and you." {n}Toriana humbly bows her head.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость... Член моего семейства оказался замешан в чем-то темном и поплатился за это, но среди знати рода Гапрак он был одинок. Мы служим Омниссии и вам". {n}Ториана покорно опускает голову перед вами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... One of my family members had been involved in something sinister and had paid the price, but he was an oddity among the nobles of the House Gaprak. We serve the Omnissiah and you." {n}Toriana humbly bows her head to you.{/n}
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... A member of my family appears to have been involved in something sinister and paid the price for it, but he was an oddity among the nobles of House Gaprak. We serve the Omnissiah and you." {n}Toriana humbly bows her head.{/n}
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: 「陛下…わが一族のひとりが邪悪に関与し、その代償を払ったように見えますが、彼はギャプラック家の貴族でも変わり者でした。私たちは万機神と陛下に仕えております」{n}トリアーナは、うやうやしく頭を下げる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... A member of my family appears to have been involved in something sinister and paid the price for it, but he was an oddity among the nobles of House Gaprak. We serve the Omnissiah and you." {n}Toriana humbly bows her head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「陛下…わが一族のひとりが邪悪に関与し、その代償を払ったように見えますが、彼はギャプラック家の貴族でも変わり者でした。私たちは万機神と陛下に仕えております」{n}トリアーナは、うやうやしく頭を下げる。{/n}
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: “大人……或许贾帕克家族的某位族人确实卷入了这桩邪恶的阴谋，也为此付出了代价。但是，他在贾帕克家族中本就是个独来独往的怪人。我们绝对忠诚于欧姆尼塞亚，忠诚于您。”{n}托丽安娜谦卑地低下了头。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... A member of my family appears to have been involved in something sinister and paid the price for it, but he was an oddity among the nobles of House Gaprak. We serve the Omnissiah and you." {n}Toriana humbly bows her head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “大人……或许贾帕克家族的某位族人确实卷入了这桩邪恶的阴谋，也为此付出了代价。但是，他在贾帕克家族中本就是个独来独往的怪人。我们绝对忠诚于欧姆尼塞亚，忠诚于您。”{n}托丽安娜谦卑地低下了头。{/n}
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie... J'admets que l'un des membres de notre famille était impliqué dans une affaire sinistre et qu'il en a payé le prix, mais c'était un marginal. Nous servons l'Omnimessie et vous, et nul autre. » {n}Toriana incline la tête avec humilité.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... A member of my family appears to have been involved in something sinister and paid the price for it, but he was an oddity among the nobles of House Gaprak. We serve the Omnissiah and you." {n}Toriana humbly bows her head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie... j'admets que l'un des membres de notre famille était impliqué dans une affaire sinistre et qu'il en a payé le prix, mais c'était un marginal. Nous servons l'Omnimessie et vous, et nul autre. » {n}Toriana incline la tête avec humilité.{/n}
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: «Mil{mf|ord|ady}, alguien de mi familia parece haber estado involucrado en algo oscuro y haber pagado por ello, pero era raro entre los Gaprak. L{mf|e|a} servimos a usted y al Omnissiah». {n}Toriana inclina la cabeza en señal de reverencia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... A member of my family appears to have been involved in something sinister and paid the price for it, but he was an oddity among the nobles of House Gaprak. We serve the Omnissiah and you." {n}Toriana humbly bows her head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Mil{mf|ord|ady}, alguien de mi familia parece haber estado involucrado en algo oscuro y haber pagado por ello, pero era raro entre los Gaprak. Le servimos a usted y al Omnissiah». {n}Toriana inclina la cabeza en señal de reverencia.{/n}
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... Eines der Mitglieder meiner Familie scheint an etwas Finsterem beteiligt gewesen zu sein und nun den Preis dafür bezahlt zu haben. Aber er war ein Sonderling unter den Adligen des Hauses Gaprak. Wir dienen dem Omnissiah und Euch." {n}Toriana senkt demütig den Kopf.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... A member of my family appears to have been involved in something sinister and paid the price for it, but he was an oddity among the nobles of House Gaprak. We serve the Omnissiah and you." {n}Toriana humbly bows her head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... Eines der Mitglieder meiner Familie scheint an etwas Finsterem beteiligt gewesen zu sein und nun den Preis dafür bezahlt zu haben. Aber er war ein Sonderling unter den Adligen des Hauses Gaprak. Wir dienen dem Omnissiah und Euch." {n}Toriana senkt demütig den Kopf.{/n}
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri... Hanemden birisi fena işlere kalkışmış ve bedelini de ödemiş. Ancak bu şahıs; Gaprak Hanesi'ne mensup, münferit bir soyludur. Biz yalnızca Hermesih'e ve size hizmet ederiz." {n}Toriana, başını tevazuyla eğiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... A member of my family appears to have been involved in something sinister and paid the price for it, but he was an oddity among the nobles of House Gaprak. We serve the Omnissiah and you." {n}Toriana humbly bows her head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri... Hanemin bir mensubu fena işlere kalkışmış ve bedelini de ödemiş. Ancak bu şahıs Gaprak Hanesi içinde münferit bir soyludur. Biz yalnızca Hermesih'e ve size hizmet ederiz." {n}Toriana başını tevazuyla eğiyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak
